TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SKCloudServiceSetupViewControllerDelegate_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DidDismiss (this StoreKit.ISKCloudServiceSetupViewControllerDelegate This, StoreKit.SKCloudServiceSetupViewController cloudServiceSetupViewController);

.method public static hidebysig void DidDismiss(class StoreKit.ISKCloudServiceSetupViewControllerDelegate This, class StoreKit.SKCloudServiceSetupViewController cloudServiceSetupViewController) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance on which this extension method operates on.
Docs.summary: Method that is called after the setup view has been dismissed.
